data.eml:eml: A checklist of parasitic helminths reported from sixty­five species of marine fish from Turkey including two new records of monogeneans

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Öktener, Ahmet (2005): A checklist of parasitic helminths reported from sixty­five species of marine fish from Turkey including two new records of monogeneans. Zootaxa 1063: 33-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273281
